title: zakservers
author: zakservers
content: Happy upcoming Christmas to you all, and may you all remain in peace, Zak Servers has created a special discount coupon for all of our visitors and clients to celebrate this occasion of Christmas, this coupon code will give you 15% off on any dedicated server configuration.Coupon Code: CHTZAKSERVERSCoupon is applicable on all offshore dedicated servers: https://zakservers.com/offshore-dedicated-servers.phpKindly note that, its only a one time offer and will not be applicable on re-occuring billing, you can use this coupon on as many orders as you want, coupon is valid from today 15.12.2022 till 31.12.2022.Thanks and we do hope that you will enjoy your Christmas day too.Bitcoin is accepted as a payment method.We do offer reliable and premium level offshore dedicated servers with full privacy and anonymity.
